text: Raquel Garcia Borreguero (born August 13, 1986 in Toledo, Spain) is a skier from Spain. She helps skiers who cannot see by telling them where to go on a mountain. Skiing with Anna Cohí Fornell, she has race in the European Cup, 2010 Winter Paralympics, |location=Spain and IPC Alpine Skiing World Cup. Garcia and Cohí skied with the Spanish national team at a training camp. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:People from Toledo, Spain Category:2006 Winter Paralympics Category:2010 Winter Paralympics Category:Sighted guides
title: Raquel García
